dialogue: Good work on the last job. As expected of [color=hackerman]{name}[/color]
Appreciate it. What will you do with the health records though?
I don’t pay you to ask questions, just do your job!
[color=whisper]Hmph, maybe this gig is a bad decision. But I really need the money...[/color]
Ok, fine. What’s this next operation?
This time you will need to break into the so-called ‘impenetrable’ Debitus Bank, and wipe out their data clean.
Apparently, my wife- I mean one of our high-profile clients, accidentally maxed out their credit cards.
[color=whisper]Oh, really? I wonder how that happened...[/color]
Anyways, I don’t think I need to remind you that banks have much tighter security compared to hospitals. Especially this one.
Sigh... Well, I guess I don’t have much of a choice. Time to dive in.
